What is combination

- Â a mathematical technique that determines the number of possible arrangements in a collection of items where the order of the selection does not matter 

- In combination order doesn't matter 

- Examples 
	- Selection from a food menu
	- Selection of clothes 
	- Selecting two desserts from from a list of 19
	- Selecting a one person from one million people in a lottery
